screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .eqp file in Design Science MathType 7.8
screenshot.caption: EQP file open in Design Science MathType 7.8

description: MathType is widely used in academic, scientific, and professional settings to generate complex equations for documents, presentations, and educational materials. Since there are many components in the MathType interface and a diverse user base, the software allows you to customize the environment to create a more efficient workflow based on your requirements and save your preferences as EQP files.
